Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants a retroactive parity payment to certain management and confidential retirees
Summary: Grants a retroactive parity payment to certain management and confidential retirees who retired between April 1, 2009 and March 31, 2015, not to exceed $5,000.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to granting a retroactive parity payment to certain management and confidential retirees
